actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Coal Mine Health and Safety Act of 1969 to require the Secretary of Labor to establish a program to assist coal miners in meeting the application and filing requirements for benefits under title IV of such act.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Labor to establish a program to assist (including representation of) coal miners in meeting the application and filing requirements for black lung benefits under title IV of the Federal Coal Mine Health and Safety Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Coal Mine Health and Safety Act of 1969 to require the Secretary of Labor to establish a program to assist coal miners in meeting the application and filing requirements for benefits under title IV of such act.
